com.gwtplatform.dispatch.annotation.helper

Class ReflectionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gwtplatform.dispatch.annotation.helper.ReflectionHelper

  • public class ReflectionHelper
extends Object
    ReflectionHelper is an internal class that provides common routines only used by the annotation processors.
    Author:
    Brendan Doherty, Florian Sauter, Stephen Haberman (concept)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

                                       String... simpleFieldNames)
        Returns only fields which simple names do not equal the passed field names.

        public Collection<VariableElement> getAnnotatedFields(Class<? extends Annotation>... annotations)

        public String getClassName()
        Returns the class name.

        For example:
        com.gwtplatform.dispatch.annotation.Foo

        Returns:
        the class name.

      • getClassRepresenter

        public TypeElement getClassRepresenter()

      • getConstantFields

        public Collection<VariableElement> getConstantFields()
        Returns all fields ordered that are Modifier.FINAL or Modifier.STATIC.

      • getFields

        public Collection<VariableElement> getFields()
        Returns all fields.

        Important: Fields are not sorted according to @Order!

        To get these sorted use getOrderedFields().

      • getFinalFields

        public Collection<VariableElement> getFinalFields()
        Returns all fields which contains Modifier.FINAL.

      • getInFields

        public Collection<VariableElement> getInFields()
        Returns all fields annotated with @In. Sorted based on the @ In annotation.

      • getModifierFields

        public Collection<VariableElement> getModifierFields(Modifier... modifiers)
        Returns all fields with the passed modifier.

      • getNonConstantFields

        public Collection<VariableElement> getNonConstantFields()
        Returns all fields that are not Modifier.FINAL or Modifier.STATIC. Sorted based on the @ Order annotation.

      • getOptionalFields

        public Collection<VariableElement> getOptionalFields()
        Returns all non constant fields annotated with @Optional. Sorted based on the @ Order annotation.

      • getOptionalFields

        public Collection<VariableElement> getOptionalFields(Class<? extends Annotation> annotation)
        Returns all non constant fields annotated with passed annotation.

        Important: Fields are not sorted!

      • getOrderedFields

        public Collection<VariableElement> getOrderedFields()
        Returns all fields ordered. Sorted based on the @ Order annotation.

      • getOutFields

        public Collection<VariableElement> getOutFields()
        Returns all fields annotated with @Out. Sorted based on the @ Out annotation.

      • getPackageName

        public String getPackageName()

      • getProcessingEnvironment

        public ProcessingEnvironment getProcessingEnvironment()

      • getRequiredFields

        public Collection<VariableElement> getRequiredFields()
        Returns all non Optional|Modifier.STATIC| Modifier.FINAL fields ordered. Sorted based on the @ Order annotation.

        Required are all:

        • Declared fields matching rules below
        • Non annotated Optional fields
        • Non Modifier.STATIC fields
        • Non Modifier.FINAL fields

      • getSimpleClassName

        public String getSimpleClassName()

      • getStaticFields

        public Collection<VariableElement> getStaticFields()
        Returns all fields which contains Modifier.STATIC.
